snippet.title: Boulder Dash Deluxe
snippet.description:
Created by two Canadian programmers in 1984, Boulder Dash has become one of the longest running videogame franchises.

The original Boulder Dash® is a pioneering interactive game and its many sequels have delighted and challenged casual and hard-core players of all ages and sexes for over three decades.

Now is the time to open a new chapter: Boulder Dash Deluxe:

- 180 new exciting and unique levels in 9 new worlds
- 15 new special opponents
- Character customization
- Classic version included with the original caves and graphics from 1984

More info at: www-boulder-dash.com
